GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.63
GSD.description:
stmmac: intel: Add a missing clk_disable_unprepare() call in intel_eth_pci_remove()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit 47129531196054b374017555165b47a43cdb6f41, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 5ec55823438e850c91c6b92aec93fb04ebde29e2. For more details please see the references link.
